properties.description: This is the Create Terms dataflow and include lookups to the TermTypeTable in the Taxonomy db.

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		DimID as integer,
		DimName as string,
		RootID as integer,
		DimPreferred as boolean,
		DimSourceID as integer,
		DimDescription as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> ThesaurusTerms
source(output(
		TermID as integer,
		TermDimID as integer,
		TermCode as string,
		TermName as string,
		TermDescription as string,
		TermPreferred as boolean,
		Available as boolean,
		TermTypeID as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> TaxonomyTerms
source(output(
		TermTypeID as integer,
		TypeName as string,
		Description as string,
		Available as boolean,
		DimTable as string,
		SourceID as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> TermTypes
ThesaurusTerms derive(PossibleTypeID = toShort(DimID)) ~> ConvertDimIDToTypeID
ConvertDimIDToTypeID, TermTypes join(DimName == TypeName
	&& DimSourceID == SourceID
	&& PossibleTypeID == TermTypeID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'none')~> LookupTypesWithDimID
SelectFromLookup, TaxonomyTerms join(DimID == TermDimID,
	joinType:'outer',
	broadcast: 'none')~> MergeJoin
Select1 split(isNull(DimID),
	not(isNull(TermID)) && not(isNull(DimID)),
	disjoint: true) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(Delete, Update, Insert)
ConditionsForDelete select(mapColumn(
		DimPreferred,
		DimID,
		TermCode,
		TermName,
		TermDescription,
		TermPreferred,
		Available,
		TermTypeID
	)) ~> SelectForDelete
ConditionalSplit1@Delete derive(Available = false()) ~> AddAvailableCol
AddAvailableCol alterRow(updateIf(isNull(DimID))) ~> ConditionsForDelete
ConditionalSplit1@Update derive(DimTypeName = left(DimName, 80),
		DimTypeDescription = left(DimDescription, 500)) ~> ConvertNameAndDesc
ConvertNameAndDesc alterRow(updateIf(not(isNull(TermID))&&not(isNull(TermDimID)))) ~> ConditionsForUpdate
ConditionsForUpdate select(mapColumn(
		DimPreferred,
		DimID,
		TermCode,
		TermName = DimName,
		TermDescription = DimDescription,
		TermPreferred = DimPreferred,
		Available,
		TermTypeID = PossibleTypeID,
		TermID
	)) ~> SelectForUpdate
ConditionalSplit1@Insert filter(isNull(TermID)) ~> TermIdIsNull
TermIdIsNull derive(Available = true(),
		RootTypeID = toShort(RootID)) ~> SetAvailable
SetAvailable, TermTypes join(RootID == TermTypes@TermTypeID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'none')~> LookupTypeWithRootID
LookupTypesWithDimID select(mapColumn(
		DimID,
		RootID,
		DimPreferred,
		DimDescription,
		PossibleTypeID,
		DimName,
		DimSourceID,
		Available
	)) ~> SelectFromLookup
LookupTypeWithRootID alterRow(insertIf(not(isNull(DimID)))) ~> ConditionsForInsertion
ConditionsForInsertion select(mapColumn(
		DimPreferred,
		DimDescription,
		PossibleTypeID,
		DimName,
		TermCode,
		Available = SetAvailable@Available,
		TermTypeID = PossibleTypeID
	)) ~> SelectForInsertion
MergeJoin select(mapColumn(
		DimID,
		RootID,
		DimPreferred,
		DimDescription,
		PossibleTypeID,
		DimName,
		DimSourceID,
		TermID,
		TermDimID,
		TermCode,
		TermName,
		TermDescription,
		TermPreferred,
		Available = TaxonomyTerms@Available,
		TermTypeID
	)) ~> Select1
SelectForInsertion sink(input(
		TermID as integer,
		DimID as integer,
		TermCode as string,
		TermName as string,
		Description as string,
		Preferred as boolean,
		Available as boolean,
		TermTypeID as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table',
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	mapColumn(
		DimID = TermTypeID,
		TermCode,
		TermName = DimName,
		Description = DimDescription,
		Preferred = DimPreferred,
		Available,
		TermTypeID
	)) ~> TaxonomyTermsInsert
SelectForDelete sink(input(
		TermID as integer,
		DimID as integer,
		TermCode as string,
		TermName as string,
		Description as string,
		Preferred as boolean,
		Available as boolean,
		TermTypeID as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table',
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['DimID'],
	mapColumn(
		DimID,
		TermCode,
		TermName,
		Description = TermDescription,
		Preferred = DimPreferred,
		Available,
		TermTypeID
	)) ~> DeleteSink
SelectForUpdate sink(input(
		TermID as integer,
		DimID as integer,
		TermCode as string,
		TermName as string,
		Description as string,
		Preferred as boolean,
		Available as boolean,
		TermTypeID as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table',
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['TermID'],
	mapColumn(
		TermID,
		DimID,
		TermCode,
		TermName,
		Description = TermDescription,
		Preferred = DimPreferred,
		Available,
		TermTypeID
	)) ~> UpdateTerm

source(output(
		DimTableName as string,
		DimID as integer,
		DimCode as string,
		DimName as string,
		DimDescription as string,
		DimActive as boolean
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> PortfolioDimensionTables
source(output(
		TermDimTable as string,
		TermID as integer,
		TermDimID as long,
		TermCode as string,
		TermName as string,
		TermDescription as string,
		TermPreferred as boolean,
		TermAvailable as boolean,
		TermTypeID as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> TaxonomyDimensionTerms
source(output(
		TermTypeID as integer,
		DimTable as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> LookupType
PortfolioDimensionTables, TaxonomyDimensionTerms join(DimID == TermDimID
	&& DimTableName == TermDimTable,
	joinType:'outer',
	broadcast: 'none')~> MergeJoin
Filter1 split(not(isNull(TermID)),
	disjoint: true) ~> ConditionalSplit@(Update, Default)
ConditionalSplit@Update select(mapColumn(
		DimID,
		TermID,
		TermCode,
		TermName,
		TermDescription,
		TermPreferred,
		TermAvailable,
		TermTypeID
	)) ~> SelectForUpdate
SelectForUpdate alterRow(updateIf(not(isNull(TermID)))) ~> MarkForUpdate
MergeJoin filter(DimID == 4303) ~> Filter1
MarkForUpdate sink(input(
		TermID as integer,
		DimID as integer,
		TermCode as string,
		TermName as string,
		Description as string,
		Preferred as boolean,
		Available as boolean,
		TermTypeID as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table',
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['TermID'],
	mapColumn(
		TermID,
		DimID,
		TermCode,
		TermName,
		Description = TermDescription,
		Preferred = TermPreferred,
		Available = TermAvailable,
		TermTypeID
	)) ~> UpdateSink

source(output(
		XDimID as integer,
		YDimID as integer,
		DimKindID as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> GetDimRelationship
source(output(
		RelationshipID as integer,
		XTermID as integer,
		XTermDimID as integer,
		YTermID as integer,
		YTermDimID as integer,
		TermKindID as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> TermRelationships
source(output(
		TermID as integer,
		DimID as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT Term.TermID, Term.DimID FROM dbo.intermediateTerm Term',
	format: 'query') ~> LookupTable
GetDimRelationship, TermRelationships join(XDimID == XTermDimID
	&& YDimID == YTermDimID
	&& DimKindID == TermKindID,
	joinType:'outer',
	broadcast: 'none')~> MergeJoin
MergeJoin split(isNull(XTermID),
	isNull(XDimID),
	disjoint: true) ~> ConditionalSplit@(Insert, Delete, UpdateDoNothing)
LookupXTerm select(mapColumn(
		YDimID,
		DimKindID,
		RelationshipID,
		XTermID = TermID,
		YTermID
	)) ~> Select1
LookupYTerm select(mapColumn(
		DimKindID,
		XTermID,
		YTermID = TermID
	)) ~> Select2
ConditionalSplit@Insert, LookupTable join(XDimID == DimID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'none')~> LookupXTerm
Select1, LookupTable join(YDimID == DimID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'none')~> LookupYTerm
Select2 alterRow(insertIf(not(isNull(XTermID)))) ~> MarkForInsertion
ConditionalSplit@Delete select(mapColumn(
		XDimID,
		DimKindID,
		RelationshipID,
		XTermID,
		YTermID
	)) ~> SelectForDeletion
SelectForDeletion alterRow(deleteIf(isNull(XDimID))) ~> MarkForDeletion
MarkForInsertion filter(not(isNull(YTermID)) && not(isNull(XTermID))) ~> Filter2
Filter2 sink(input(
		RelationshipID as integer,
		TermXID as integer,
		TermYID as integer,
		KindID as integer,
		Description as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table',
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	mapColumn(
		TermXID = XTermID,
		TermYID = YTermID,
		KindID = DimKindID
	)) ~> InsertRelationship
MarkForDeletion sink(input(
		RelationshipID as integer,
		TermXID as integer,
		TermYID as integer,
		KindID as integer,
		Description as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table',
	deletable:true,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['RelationshipID'],
	mapColumn(
		RelationshipID,
		TermXID = XTermID,
		TermYID = YTermID,
		KindID = DimKindID
	)) ~> DeleteRelationship

properties.description: This is the Create Terms dataflow and include lookups to the TermTypeTable in the Taxonomy db.

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		DimID as integer,
		DimName as string,
		RootID as integer,
		DimPreferred as boolean,
		DimSourceID as integer,
		DimDescription as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> ThesaurusTerms
source(output(
		TermID as integer,
		TermDimID as integer,
		TermCode as string,
		TermName as string,
		TermDescription as string,
		TermPreferred as boolean,
		Available as boolean,
		TermTypeID as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> TaxonomyTerms
source(output(
		TermTypeID as integer,
		TypeName as string,
		Description as string,
		Available as boolean,
		DimTable as string,
		SourceID as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> TermTypes
ThesaurusTerms derive(PossibleTypeID = toShort(DimID)) ~> ConvertDimIDToTypeID
ConvertDimIDToTypeID, TermTypes join(DimName == TypeName
	&& DimSourceID == SourceID
	&& PossibleTypeID == TermTypeID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'none')~> LookupTypesWithDimID
SelectFromLookup, TaxonomyTerms join(DimID == TermDimID,
	joinType:'outer',
	partitionBy('roundRobin', 2),
	broadcast: 'none')~> MergeJoin
Select1 split(isNull(DimID),
	isNull(TermID),
	disjoint: true) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(Delete, Insert, Default)
ConditionsForSoftDelete select(mapColumn(
		DimPreferred,
		DimID,
		TermCode,
		TermName,
		TermDescription,
		TermPreferred,
		Available,
		TermTypeID
	)) ~> SelectForDelete
ConditionalSplit1@Delete derive(Available = false()) ~> AddAvailableCol
AddAvailableCol alterRow(updateIf(isNull(DimID))) ~> ConditionsForSoftDelete
ConditionalSplit1@Default derive(DimTypeName = left(DimName, 80),
		DimTypeDescription = left(DimDescription, 500)) ~> ConvertNameAndDesc
DerivedColumn1 alterRow(updateIf(not(DimName==TermName&&((DimPreferred==TermPreferred)&&(DimDescription==TermDescription))))) ~> ConditionsForUpdate
ConditionsForUpdate select(mapColumn(
		DimPreferred,
		DimID,
		TermCode,
		TermName,
		DimDescription,
		TermPreferred,
		TermTypeID,
		TermID,
		TermDescription,
		Available
	)) ~> SelectForUpdate
ConditionalSplit1@Insert derive(Available = true(),
		RootTypeID = toShort(RootID)) ~> SetAvailable
SetAvailable, TermTypes join(RootTypeID == TermTypes@TermTypeID,
	joinType:'inner',
	partitionBy('roundRobin', 2),
	broadcast: 'none')~> LookupTypeWithRootID
LookupTypesWithDimID select(mapColumn(
		DimID,
		RootID,
		DimPreferred,
		DimDescription,
		PossibleTypeID,
		DimName,
		DimSourceID
	)) ~> SelectFromLookup
LookupTypeWithRootID alterRow(insertIf(not(isNull(DimID)))) ~> ConditionsForInsertion
ConditionsForInsertion select(mapColumn(
		DimPreferred,
		DimDescription,
		DimName,
		TermCode,
		Available = SetAvailable@Available,
		TermTypeID = TermTypes@TermTypeID
	)) ~> SelectForInsertion
MergeJoin select(mapColumn(
		DimID,
		RootID,
		DimPreferred,
		DimDescription,
		DimName,
		DimSourceID,
		TermID,
		TermDimID,
		TermCode,
		TermName,
		TermDescription,
		TermPreferred,
		TermTypeID,
		Available
	)) ~> Select1
ConvertNameAndDesc derive(DimPreferred = iif(isNull(DimPreferred), false(), DimPreferred),
		TermPreferred = iif(isNull(TermPreferred), false(), TermPreferred),
		DimTypeDescription = iif(isNull(DimTypeDescription), ' ', DimTypeDescription),
		TermDescription = iif(isNull(TermDescription), ' ', TermDescription)) ~> DerivedColumn1
SelectForInsertion sink(input(
		TermID as integer,
		DimID as integer,
		TermCode as string,
		TermName as string,
		Description as string,
		Preferred as boolean,
		Available as boolean,
		TermTypeID as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table',
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	mapColumn(
		DimID = TermTypeID,
		TermCode,
		TermName = DimName,
		Description = DimDescription,
		Preferred = DimPreferred,
		Available,
		TermTypeID
	)) ~> TaxonomyTermsInsert
SelectForDelete sink(input(
		TermID as integer,
		DimID as integer,
		TermCode as string,
		TermName as string,
		Description as string,
		Preferred as boolean,
		Available as boolean,
		TermTypeID as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table',
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['DimID'],
	mapColumn(
		DimID,
		TermCode,
		TermName,
		Description = TermDescription,
		Preferred = DimPreferred,
		Available,
		TermTypeID
	)) ~> DeleteSink
SelectForUpdate sink(input(
		TermID as integer,
		DimID as integer,
		TermCode as string,
		TermName as string,
		Description as string,
		Preferred as boolean,
		Available as boolean,
		TermTypeID as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table',
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['TermID'],
	mapColumn(
		TermID,
		DimID,
		TermCode,
		TermName,
		Description = TermDescription,
		Preferred = DimPreferred,
		TermTypeID
	)) ~> UpdateTerm

properties.description: This is the Create Terms dataflow and include lookups to the TermTypeTable in the Taxonomy db.

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		DimID as integer,
		DimName as string,
		RootID as integer,
		DimPreferred as boolean,
		DimSourceID as integer,
		DimDescription as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> ThesaurusTerms
source(output(
		TermID as integer,
		TermDimID as integer,
		TermCode as string,
		TermName as string,
		TermDescription as string,
		TermPreferred as boolean,
		Available as boolean,
		TermTypeID as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> TaxonomyTerms
source(output(
		TermTypeID as integer,
		TypeName as string,
		Description as string,
		Available as boolean,
		DimTable as string,
		SourceID as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> TermTypes
ThesaurusTerms derive(PossibleTypeID = toShort(DimID)) ~> ConvertDimIDToTypeID
ConvertDimIDToTypeID, TermTypes join(DimName == TypeName
	&& DimSourceID == SourceID
	&& PossibleTypeID == TermTypeID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'none')~> LookupTypesWithDimID
SelectFromLookup, TaxonomyTerms join(DimID == TermDimID,
	joinType:'outer',
	broadcast: 'none')~> MergeJoin
MergeJoin split(isNull(TermID),
	isNull(DimID),
	not(isNull(TermID)),
	disjoint: true) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(Insert, Delete, Update, Default)
ConditionalSplit1@Insert derive(Available = true(),
		RootTypeID = toShort(RootID)) ~> SetAvailable
SetAvailable, TermTypes join(RootID == TermTypes@TermTypeID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'none')~> LookupTypeWithRootID
LookupTypesWithDimID select(mapColumn(
		DimID,
		RootID,
		DimPreferred,
		DimDescription,
		PossibleTypeID,
		DimName,
		DimSourceID
	)) ~> SelectFromLookup
LookupTypeWithRootID alterRow(insertIf(not(isNull(DimID)))) ~> ConditionsForInsertion
ConditionsForInsertion select(mapColumn(
		DimPreferred,
		DimDescription,
		PossibleTypeID,
		DimName,
		TermCode,
		Available = SetAvailable@Available,
		TermTypeID = PossibleTypeID
	)) ~> SelectForInsertion
ConditionalSplit1@Delete alterRow(updateIf(TermID==286337)) ~> ConditionsForDelete
DerivedColumn1 select(mapColumn(
		DimPreferred,
		DimID = TermDimID,
		TermCode,
		TermName,
		TermDescription,
		TermPreferred,
		Available,
		TermTypeID
	)) ~> SelectForDelete
ConditionsForDelete derive(Available = false()) ~> DerivedColumn1
ConditionalSplit1@Update derive(DimTypeName = left(DimName, 80),
		DimTypeDescription = left(DimDescription, 500)) ~> ConvertNameAndDesc
ConvertNameAndDesc alterRow(updateIf(not(isNull(TermID)))) ~> ConditionsForUpdate
DerivedColumn2 select(mapColumn(
		DimPreferred,
		DimID = TermDimID,
		TermCode,
		TermName,
		TermDescription,
		TermPreferred,
		Available,
		TermTypeID,
		TermID
	)) ~> SelectForUpdate
ConditionsForUpdate derive(DimTypeName = TermName,
		DimTypeDescription = DimDescription,
		DimPreferred = DimPreferred) ~> DerivedColumn2
SelectForInsertion sink(input(
		TermID as integer,
		DimID as integer,
		TermCode as string,
		TermName as string,
		Description as string,
		Preferred as boolean,
		Available as boolean,
		TermTypeID as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table',
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	mapColumn(
		DimID = TermTypeID,
		TermCode,
		TermName = DimName,
		Description = DimDescription,
		Preferred = DimPreferred,
		Available,
		TermTypeID
	)) ~> TaxonomyTermsInsert
SelectForDelete sink(input(
		TermID as integer,
		DimID as integer,
		TermCode as string,
		TermName as string,
		Description as string,
		Preferred as boolean,
		Available as boolean,
		TermTypeID as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table',
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['DimID'],
	mapColumn(
		DimID,
		TermCode,
		TermName,
		Description = TermDescription,
		Preferred = DimPreferred,
		Available,
		TermTypeID
	)) ~> DeleteSink
SelectForUpdate sink(input(
		TermID as integer,
		DimID as integer,
		TermCode as string,
		TermName as string,
		Description as string,
		Preferred as boolean,
		Available as boolean,
		TermTypeID as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table',
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['TermID'],
	mapColumn(
		TermID,
		DimID,
		TermCode,
		TermName,
		Description = TermDescription,
		Preferred = DimPreferred,
		Available,
		TermTypeID
	)) ~> UpdateTerm

source(output(
		RelationshipID as integer,
		TermXID as integer,
		TermYID as integer,
		KindID as integer,
		Description as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> TermRelationships
TermRelationships alterRow(deleteIf(not(isNull(TermXID)))) ~> DelIfTermXIDIsNotNull
DelIfTermXIDIsNotNull alterRow(deleteIf(not(isNull(TermYID)))) ~> DelIfTermYIDIsNull
DelIfTermYIDIsNull sink(input(
		RelationshipID as integer,
		TermXID as integer,
		TermYID as integer,
		KindID as integer,
		Description as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table',
	deletable:true,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['RelationshipID']) ~> DeleteSink

source(output(
		DimTableName as string,
		DimID as integer,
		DimCode as string,
		DimName as string,
		DimDescription as string,
		DimActive as boolean
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> PortfolioDimensionTables
source(output(
		TermDimTable as string,
		TermID as integer,
		TermDimID as long,
		TermCode as string,
		TermName as string,
		TermDescription as string,
		TermPreferred as boolean,
		TermAvailable as boolean,
		TermTypeID as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,

PortfolioDimensionTables, TaxonomyDimensionTerms join(DimID == TermDimID
	&& DimTableName == TermDimTable,
	joinType:'outer',
	broadcast: 'none')~> MergeJoin
MergeJoin split(isNull(TermID),
	isNull(DimID),
	disjoint: true) ~> ConditionalSplit@(Insert, Delete, Update)
ConditionalSplit@Insert derive(Preferred = true()) ~> DerivedColumn
DerivedColumn, LookupType lookup(DimTableName == DimTable,
	broadcast: 'none')~> Lookup1
Lookup1 select(mapColumn(
		DimID,
		DimCode,
		DimName,
		DimDescription,
		DimActive,
		TermID,
		Preferred,
		TermTypeID_LookUp = LookupType@TermTypeID
	)) ~> SelectForInsertion
ConditionalSplit@Delete select(mapColumn(
		DimID,
		TermID,
		TermCode,
		TermName
	)) ~> SelectForDeletion
SelectForDeletion alterRow(deleteIf(isNull(DimID))) ~> MarkForDeletion
Filter1 select(mapColumn(
		DimID,
		TermID,
		TermCode,
		TermName,
		TermDescription,
		TermPreferred,
		TermAvailable,
		TermTypeID
	)) ~> SelectForUpdate
SelectForUpdate alterRow(updateIf(not(isNull(TermID)))) ~> MarkForUpdate
SelectForInsertion alterRow(insertIf(not(isNull(TermTypeID_LookUp)))) ~> AlterRow1
AlterRow1 filter(not(isNull(TermTypeID_LookUp))) ~> RemoveNullTermTypeID
ConditionalSplit@Update derive(DimName = iif(isNull(DimName), ' ', DimName),
		TermName = iif(isNull(TermName), ' ', TermName),
		TermDescription = iif(isNull(TermDescription), ' ', TermDescription),
		DimDescription = iif(isNull(DimDescription), ' ', DimDescription),
		{ DimActive} = iif(isNull(DimActive), true(), DimActive),
		{ TermAvailable} = iif(isNull(TermAvailable), true(), TermAvailable),
		DimCode = iif(isNull(DimCode), ' ', DimCode),
		{ TermCode} = iif(isNull(TermCode), ' ', TermCode)) ~> DerivedReplaceNullsColumn1
DerivedReplaceNullsColumn1 filter(not((DimName == TermName) && (TermDescription == DimDescription) && (DimActive == TermAvailable) && (DimCode == TermCode))) ~> Filter1
RemoveNullTermTypeID sink(input(
		TermID as integer,
		DimID as integer,
		TermCode as string,
		TermName as string,
		Description as string,
		Preferred as boolean,
		Available as boolean,
		TermTypeID as integer

	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table',
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	mapColumn(

		TermCode = DimCode,
		TermName = DimName,
		Description = DimDescription,

		Available = DimActive,

		TermTypeID

ReplaceNulls filter(not((DimName == TermName) && (TermDescription == DimDescription) && (DimActive == TermAvailable) && (DimCode == TermCode))) ~> Filter1
RemoveNullTermTypeID sink(input(

source(output(
		DimID as integer,
		DimName as string,
		DimDescription as string
	),

	format: 'table') ~> GetThesaurusTypes
source(output(
		TermTypeID as integer,
		TypeName as string,
		TypeDescription as string,
		TypeAvailable as boolean,
		TypeSourceID as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> GetTaxonomyTermTypes
GetThesaurusTypes, GetTaxonomyTermTypes join(DimID == TermTypeID,
	joinType:'outer',
	broadcast: 'none')~> MergeJoin
MergeJoin split(isNull(TermTypeID),
	isNull(DimID),
	left(DimName, 80) == TypeName && (iif(isNull(left(DimDescription, 500)), '', 'DimDescription') == iif(isNull(TypeDescription), '', TypeDescription)),
	disjoint: true) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(insert, delete, DoNothingOnMatch, update)
ConditionalSplit1@insert derive(DimAvailable = true(),
		DimSourceID = 2,
		DimTypeName = left(DimName, 80),
		DimTypeDescription = left(DimDescription, 500)) ~> ConvertDimToType
ConvertDimToType select(mapColumn(
		TermTypeID = DimID,
		TypeName = DimTypeName,
		TypeDescription = DimTypeDescription,
		TypeAvailable = DimAvailable,
		DimSourceID
	)) ~> SelectColumnsToInsert
Filter1 derive(DimTypeName = left(DimName, 80),
		DimTypeDescription = left(DimDescription, 500)) ~> ConvertNameAndDesc
ConditionForUpdate select(mapColumn(
		TermTypeID,
		DimName = DimTypeName,
		DimDescription = DimTypeDescription,
		Available = TypeAvailable,
		SourceID = TypeSourceID
	)) ~> SelectForUpdate
ConvertNameAndDesc alterRow(updateIf(not(isNull(TermTypeID)))) ~> ConditionForUpdate
ConditionalSplit1@delete alterRow(updateIf(not(isNull(TermTypeID)))) ~> ConditionForDelete
SelectValueToModify select(mapColumn(
		TermTypeID,
		TypeName,
		TypeAvailable,
		TypeSourceID,
		Description = TypeDescription
	)) ~> TermTypeSoftDelete
RemoveNullTermTypeID derive(TypeAvailable = TypeAvailable == false()) ~> SelectValueToModify
SelectValueToModify select(mapColumn(
		TermTypeID,
		TypeName,
		TypeDescription,
		TypeAvailable
	)) ~> SoftDeleteTermTable
SelectColumnsToInsert alterRow(insertIf(not(isNull(TermTypeID)))) ~> AssignForInsertion
ConditionForDelete filter(not(isNull(TermTypeID))) ~> RemoveNullTermTypeID
ConditionalSplit1@update derive(DimDescription = iif(isNull(DimDescription), ' ', DimDescription),
		TypeDescription = iif(isNull(TypeDescription), ' ', TypeDescription)) ~> ReplaceNullsWithSpace
ReplaceNullsWithSpace filter(not(left(DimName, 80) == TypeName && (left(DimDescription, 500) == TypeDescription))&& !isNull(DimID) && not(isNull(TermTypeID))) ~> Filter1
AssignForInsertion sink(input(
		TermTypeID as integer,
		TypeName as string,
		Description as string,
		Available as boolean,
		DimTable as string,
		SourceID as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table',
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['TermTypeID'],
	mapColumn(
		TermTypeID,
		TypeName,
		Description = TypeDescription,
		Available = TypeAvailable,
		SourceID = DimSourceID
	)) ~> InsertSink
SelectForUpdate sink(input(
		TermTypeID as integer,
		TypeName as string,
		Description as string,
		Available as boolean,
		DimTable as string,
		SourceID as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table',
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['TermTypeID'],
	mapColumn(
		TermTypeID,
		TypeName = DimName,
		Description = DimDescription,
		Available,
		SourceID
	),
	dateFormat:'dd/MM/yyyy') ~> UpdateSink
TermTypeSoftDelete sink(input(
		TermTypeID as integer,
		TypeName as string,
		Description as string,
		Available as boolean,
		DimTable as string,
		SourceID as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table',
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['TermTypeID'],
	mapColumn(
		TermTypeID,
		TypeName,
		Description,
		Available = TypeAvailable,
		SourceID = TypeSourceID
	)) ~> DeleteSink
SoftDeleteTermTable sink(input(
		TermID as integer,
		DimID as integer,
		TermCode as string,
		TermName as string,
		Description as string,
		Preferred as boolean,
		Available as boolean,
		TermTypeID as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table',
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['TermTypeID'],
	mapColumn(
		TermTypeID,
		TermName = TypeName,
		Description = TypeDescription,
		Available = TypeAvailable
	)) ~> MarkTermsOfThisTypeAlsoUnavailable

PortfolioDimensionTables, TaxonomyDimensionTerms join(DimID == TermDimID
	&& DimTableName == TermDimTable,
	joinType:'outer',
	broadcast: 'none')~> MergeJoin
ConditionalSplit1@Insert derive(Preferred = true()) ~> AddPreferredColumn
AddPreferredColumn, LookupType lookup(DimTableName == DimTable,
	broadcast: 'none')~> Lookup1
Lookup1 select(mapColumn(
		DimID,
		DimCode,

	)) ~> SelectForInsertion
SelectForInsertion alterRow(insertIf(not(isNull(TermTypeID_LookUp)))) ~> AlterRow1
AlterRow1 filter(not(isNull(TermTypeID_LookUp))) ~> Filter2
MergeJoin split(isNull(TermID),
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(Insert, Default)
Filter2 sink(input(
		TermID as integer,
		DimID as integer,
		TermCode as string,
		TermName as string,
		Description as string,
		Preferred as boolean,
		Available as boolean,

	)) ~> SinkIntoTermTaxonomy

properties.description: Pipeline to create the Thesaurus Terms (Dim) Source dataset for use in the CreateTerms dataflow

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT DISTINCT CAST(Term.id AS BIGINT)  DimID, 
       CAST(Term.name AS NVARCHAR(200)) DimName, 
       dbo.GetRootParent(Term.id) RootID,
       CAST(CASE ISNULL(Relation.relationship, 0)
          WHEN 0 THEN 1
          ELSE 0
          END AS BIT) DimPreferred,
       CAST(2 AS SMALLINT) DimSourceID,
       CAST(RTRIM(Term.scope + ' ' + Term.additionalnotes) AS NVARCHAR(500)) DimDescription
  from dbo.Term
   LEFT JOIN dbo.Relation ON Relation.relatedtermid = Term.id AND Relation.relationship=2
  ORDER BY DimID
